metadata.hypothesis_statement: Major League Cricket is preparing procurement related to UI/UX Design Project
metadata.justification: The content contains an active, open RFP for a Digital Transformation Project that directly relates to UI/UX design, as it aims to improve fan experience and integrate digital systems. This meets the ACCEPT criteria for a clear procurement signal.

evidence.content: American Cricket Enterprises has issued an RFP for a Digital Transformation Project. This solution will improve the fan experience, optimize commercial opportunities and integrate with existing and new systems for ticketing, merchandise, email marketing, and more... Proposals due on 10 October, 2025.

metadata.hypothesis_statement: Major League Cricket is preparing procurement related to Python Data Processing Project
metadata.justification: The RFP mentions a 'Digital Transformation Project' that will integrate systems for 'ticketing, merchandise, email marketing, and more' while maintaining data compliance. This indicates a focus on data processing and analytics capabilities, aligning with the Python Data Processing Project hypothesis, but does not explicitly mention Python or specific data engineering procurement.

evidence.content: integrate with existing and new systems for ticketing, merchandise, email marketing, and more whilst also maintaining compliance with relevant data protection and privacy laws
